certifications.title: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)
certifications.description: ISC2's premier cybersecurity certification validating deep technical and managerial security knowledge.

certifications.title: Certified Information Security Manager (CISM)
certifications.description: ISACA's certification for information security management professionals.

certifications.title: Offensive Security Certified Professional (OSCP)
certifications.description: OffSec's hands-on penetration testing certification proving practical ethical hacking skills.

certifications.title: GIAC Exploit Researcher and Advanced Penetration Tester (GXPN)
certifications.description: SANS GIAC certification for advanced penetration testing and exploit development.

certifications.title: GIAC Penetration Tester (GPEN)
certifications.description: SANS GIAC certification validating penetration testing methodologies and technical skills.

certifications.title: CompTIA SecurityX (formerly CASP+)
certifications.description: CompTIA's advanced cybersecurity certification for security architects and senior engineers.

certifications.title: CompTIA Security+ ce
certifications.description: CompTIA's foundational cybersecurity certification covering essential security concepts.

certifications.title: CompTIA Network+ ce
certifications.description: CompTIA's networking certification validating skills to design, configure, and troubleshoot networks.

certifications.title: CompTIA A+ ce
certifications.description: CompTIA's foundational IT certification covering hardware, software, and troubleshooting.

certifications.title: CompTIA Linux+ (Powered by LPI)
certifications.description: CompTIA's Linux certification validating essential Linux administration skills.

certifications.title: CompTIA Project+
certifications.description: CompTIA's project management certification for IT professionals.

certifications.title: CompTIA Secure Infrastructure Specialist (CSIS)
certifications.description: CompTIA stackable certification combining Security+, Network+, and A+ credentials.

certifications.title: CompTIA Linux Network Professional (CLNP)
certifications.description: CompTIA stackable certification combining Linux+ and Network+ credentials.

certifications.title: CompTIA Systems Support Specialist (CSSS)
certifications.description: CompTIA stackable certification combining A+ and Linux+ credentials.

certifications.title: CompTIA IT Operations Specialist (CIOS)
certifications.description: CompTIA stackable certification combining A+ and Network+ credentials.
